definition: to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]
to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on

sentences.english: Each rivet only takes a minute or two to do.
sentences.chinese: 每個鉚釘只需要一兩分鐘的事。

sentences.english: The rv73g is a rugged electric bulb-tite installation tool designed for use in metal clad building construction.
sentences.chinese: 耐用的電動盲孔鉚釘安裝工具，用於金屬殼建築構造。

sentences.english: The rivet heads are in good condition and without abrasion.
sentences.chinese: 鉚釘釘頭狀況良好，並無過度磨損。

sentences.english: This alloy is commonly used in airframes, where it is almost always riveted.
sentences.chinese: 此合金通常用於機身，且用鉚釘固定。

sentences.english: Rivets are arranged on the raincoat corners which can be fixed on the motorcycle.
sentences.chinese: 雨衣角上帶有鉚釘，可與摩托車固定。

sentences.english: Two large kangaroo pockets with metal rivets.
sentences.chinese: 兩個金屬鉚釘在大袋鼠口袋上。

sentences.english: Two wave-shaped in part by the rivets, bearings for high load operation.
sentences.chinese: 浪形的兩部分由鉚釘固定，用於高負荷運行的軸承。

sentences.english: Large-scale rivet connection rail track and mountain massif , respect natural link.
sentences.chinese: 大型鉚釘連接滑軌與山體，尊重自然環。

sentences.english: Besides, there's no reed on hilt, but a copper rivet .
sentences.chinese: 另外，此劍柄上並無按簧，那是一個銅鉚釘。

sentences.english: Davis had invented a process for making rivets for jeans.
sentences.chinese: 戴維斯發明了牛仔褲的鉚釘的過程。

sentences.english: Either that, or the front panels were sawed off and later reattached with rivets.
sentences.chinese: 要麼，或前板鋸起飛後復位與鉚釘。

sentences.english: It has a bunch of rivets too.
sentences.chinese: 它有一大堆的鉚釘過於。

sentences.english: I took the time to hit every rivet from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 我的時間，以達到每一個鉚釘從內。

sentences.english: The production of mid-air heart rivets, metal stamping parts, zinc alloy die castings.
sentences.chinese: 生產半空心鉚釘，五金衝壓件，鋅合金壓鑄件。

sentences.english: During fabrication , I riveted the trailing edge with my hand rivet squeezer.
sentences.chinese: 在製作，我鉚接尾隨的優勢，與我的手鉚釘擠壓。

sentences.english: In the course of the analysis, the influence of rivet flexibility and the condition of the broken edge stiffener are taken into consideration.
sentences.chinese: 分析中考慮了鉚釘柔度的影響和邊加筋條斷的情況。

definition: acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
